mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart VALUES( cart_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{product_id}, NULL, #{cart_delivery_date}, #{cart_quantity}, 'checked' )
mapper.select: SELECT cart_id, p.product_id AS product_id, TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY)') AS cart_delivery_date, cart_quantity, cart_state, product_name, product_price, product_file_name FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_file pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{member_id} AND (c.cart_state = 'checked' OR c.cart_state = 'unChecked' OR c.cart_state = 'deadLine') AND pf.product_file_path = 'main' ORDER BY cart_delivery_date

SELECT cart_id, p.product_id AS product_id, TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY)') AS cart_delivery_date, cart_quantity, cart_state, product_name, product_price, product_file_name FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_file pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{member_id} AND c.cart_state = 'checked' AND pf.product_file_path = 'main' ORDER BY cart_delivery_date

SELECT TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY)') AS cart_delivery_date, cart_quantity, p.product_id AS product_id, product_name, product_price, product_file_name FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_file pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id WHERE payment_id = #{payment_id} AND pf.product_file_path = 'main' ORDER BY cart_delivery_date
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cart_quantity = #{cart_quantity} WHERE cart_id = #{cart_id}
UPDATE cart SET cart_state = #{cart_state} WHERE cart_id = #{cart_id}
UPDATE cart SET cart_state = #{cart_state} WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND (cart_state = 'checked' OR cart_state = 'unChecked')

UPDATE cart SET cart_state = #{cart_state} WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{cart_delivery_date} AND (cart_state = 'checked' OR cart_state = 'unChecked')

UPDATE cart SET cart_state = 'deadLine' WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND (cart_state = 'checked' OR cart_state = 'unChecked') AND TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 2, 'YYYYMMDD')
UPDATE cart SET payment_id = #{payment_id}, cart_state = 'payment' WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND cart_state = 'checked'

UPDATE cart SET cart_state = #{hash_state} WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND cart_state != 'checked' AND cart_state != 'unChecked' AND cart_state != 'deadLine' AND TO_CHAR(cart_delivery_date, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + #{hash_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')
